Terms
Type divides into 1 :
payoff type (valuation) belief type (private information)
Deliberation: action that secretly updates belief type
introspection: updates agent's beliefs about their own valuation. strategic deliberation 2 : updates agent's beliefs about other agents valuation.
Beliefs over time with residual uncertainty:
ex ante: no private information ex interim: one agent's private information ex post: all agents' private information ex interim perfect: one agent's valuation ex post perfect: all agents' valuations Introduction

Taxonomy
We classify settings with deliberative agents along five major axes:
Valuation distribution: Are agents' valuations independent?
Privacy: Can agents discover information about each other's valuations? Volatility: Can an agent's valuation change? Introduction
